Key Match Events: Guinea took an unexpected lead just 10 minutes in as they capitalised on some woeful defending from Olivier Kemen.
François Kamano was sent off for a nasty challenge.
Frank Magri popped up with the vital goal to secure a draw for Cameroon in their first match of the Africa Cup of Nations against 10-man Guinea.
Post-Match Reflections: Frank Magri's goal was the only highlight for Cameroon despite being a man down.
Guinea struggled to create any chances after François Kamano's red card.
